SEARCH
Package hu.nye.service

Interface CRMServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CRMService
public interface CRMServiceInterface
Interface defining the operations for managing customer relationships in the CRM system.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addCustomer(Customer customer)
    Adds a new customer to the CRM system.
    Customer
    getCustomerDetails(Integer customerId)
    Retrieves the details of a customer by their ID.
    void
    removeCustomer(Customer customer)
    Removes an existing customer from the CRM system.

  • Method Details

    • addCustomer

      void addCustomer(Customer customer)
      Adds a new customer to the CRM system.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer to be added.

    • removeCustomer

      void removeCustomer(Customer customer)
      Removes an existing customer from the CRM system.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer to be removed.

    • getCustomerDetails

      Customer getCustomerDetails(Integer customerId)
      Retrieves the details of a customer by their ID.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The customer object if found, or null if not found.
